thread.section_title: Fast Cover Travel Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fast Cover Travel Insurance | fastcover.com.au
thread.title: bryan
thread.title_full: Fast Cover Travel Insurance reviewed by bryan

author: bryan
title: bryan
text: I had trouble on the computer with qoute. I phoned Fast cover and received excellent service. The policy took a few minutes to complete over the phone. The sales assistant gave me a discount because I had used the company last year. Touch wood i dont have to make a claim while i am overseas. But if i do i am sure that there wont be any problems. The policy was $1000 cheaper than the one suggested by our travel agent
